ygData.subject: Re: Voli Greenwhisper
ygData.msgSnippet: From all that I ve heard, they do not spawn Grim Oakfist any more, because the treant fist NEEDS to be nerfed first.  And if he does spawn, the tigers will
ygData.messageBody:
From all that I've heard, they do not spawn Grim Oakfist any more, because
the treant fist NEEDS to be nerfed first. And if he does spawn, the tigers
will not. I personally totally agree with this, treant fists are not
something we need, they would make up way too powerful and totally throw off
game balance. Come on now, do you really need gloves that have limitless
charges of CH? Let's plz all play fair :o)

Kanja
Rodcet Nife
